title: HOUR 1 - Celtics-Heat, Chris Paul, Kyrie Irving
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Celtics-Heat, Chris Paul, Kyrie Irving
description:
Prediction for the Celtics-Heat series

Colin defends Chris Paul by looking at his entire career

Kevin Durant is finally holding Kyrie Irving accountable 

 

Guest: Peter King
